thread.title: Wells Fargo Woos Credit Suisse Brokers After Striking Recruitment Deal
thread.title_full: Wells Fargo Woos Credit Suisse Brokers After Striking Recruitment Deal - WSJ

author: Michael Wursthorn
title: Wells Fargo Woos Credit Suisse Brokers After Striking Recruitment Deal
text:
Wells Fargo & Co. executives have begun wooing brokers from Credit Suisse Group AG’s U.S. private-banking unit as part of an arrangement announced by the two companies late Tuesday.
Credit Suisse is winding down its U.S. private-banking operations and Wells Fargo is looking to deepen its brokerage’s presence in the ultrawealthy client arena. The banks said in statements late Tuesday that they struck a recruiting arrangement to...
